file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 72-63-01-06 - ACCESSORY DRIVE GEAR BOX ASSEMBLY - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL ACCESSORY DRIVE GEAR BOX ASSEMBLY - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do the inspection of the accessory-drive-gearbox assembly. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ACCESSORY-DRIVE-GEARBOX ASSY - ALL 72-63-01-200-801-A INSPECTION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 72-63-01 Page 1 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 72-63-01-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. ACCESSORY-DRIVE-GEARBOX ASSY - INSPECTION A. General (1) Obey the instructions below to do the inspection of the accessory-drive-gearbox assembly. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 71-12-01-000-801-A/400 ENGINE LOWER COWLING - OPENING AMM TASK 71-12-01-400-801-A/400 ENGINE LOWER COWLING - CLOSING C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 415 LH Engine 425 RH Engine D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Ladder To get access to the engine 1 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Engine fan assembly I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Put the ladder next to the air intake. (2) Open the lower cowling ( AMM TASK 71-12-01-000-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 72-63-01 Page 2 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Accessory-Drive-Gearbox Assy - GVI SUBTASK 212-002-A (1) Do a visual inspection on the accessory drive gearbox assy. Refer to the latest revision of Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Close the lower cowling ( AMM TASK 71-12-01-400-801-A/400). (2) Remove the ladder. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 72-63-01 Page 3 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
